hero.title: About BitNova
hero.description: BitNova is your trusted platform for seamless and secure trading. Built with cutting-edge technology, we empower users to navigate the financial markets with confidence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify trading for everyone through transparency, technology, and education — helping traders of all levels access powerful tools with ease.

members.name: Ghulam Mustafa
members.bio: As BitNova’s frontend developer, Ghulam ensures the platform delivers a fast, modern, and engaging experience through his expertise in React and interface design.

members.name: Ghulam Mustafa
members.bio: Ghulam Mustafa is the visionary developer behind BitNova’s core platform. Blending fintech passion with modern technology, he leads the product’s design and development.

members.name: Hadi Memon
members.bio: Hadi Memon is the originator of BitNova’s concept. With deep knowledge of spot and futures trading, he guided the foundation and direction of BitNova.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a question or want to collaborate with us? Reach out anytime — we’d love to hear from you!
